SVGAttributeZ.summary: The z attribute defines the location along the z-axis for a light source in the coordinate system established by the {{SVGAttr("primitiveUnits")}} attribute on the filter element, assuming that, in the initial coordinate system, the positive z-axis comes out towards the person viewing the content and assuming that one unit along the z-axis equals one unit in x and y.

remarks.para: You can use this attribute with the following SVG elements:
